Class ActivationsCachedNeuron

java.lang.Object
net.tvburger.jdl.model.scalars.LinearCombination
net.tvburger.jdl.model.scalars.LinearCombination
net.tvburger.jdl.model.scalars.NeuronFunction
net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn.Neuron
net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn.ActivationsCachedNeuron
All Implemented Interfaces:
EstimationFunction, ScalarEstimationFunction, TrainableScalarFunction, TrainableFunction
@Decorator public class ActivationsCachedNeuron extends Neuron
A Neuron that caches activations for later retrieval.

This neuron extends the base Neuron class and stores a list of ActivationsCachedNeuron.Activation objects, which contain the input values, target digit, output, and gradient for each activation. This is useful for backpropagation, debugging, or analysis of the neuronâ€™s behavior over time.

The class is annotated with Decorator to indicate that it enhances the standard neuron with caching functionality.

  • Constructor Details

    • ActivationsCachedNeuron

      public ActivationsCachedNeuron(String name, List<? extends Neuron> inputs, ActivationFunction activationFunction)
      Constructs a new neuron with caching capabilities.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the neuron
      inputs - the list of input neurons
      activationFunction - the activation function used by this neuron

  • Method Details

    • activate

      public void activate()
      Activates the neuron and caches the result.

      If the neuron is already activated, this method does nothing. Otherwise, it performs the standard Neuron.activate() operation and stores an ActivationsCachedNeuron.Activation record in the cache containing: inputs, logit, output, and gradient.

      Overrides:
      activate in class Neuron

    • getCache

      public List<ActivationsCachedNeuron.Activation> getCache()
      Returns the cached activations.
      Returns:
      the list of ActivationsCachedNeuron.Activation records representing past activations

    • clearCache

      public void clearCache()
      Clears all cached activations.

      This method is synchronized to ensure thread safety when modifying the cache.
